item.description: Gnome Wizard of the School of Illusion ![[Pasted image 20221209174527.png]] Important Relations Adventuring with [[Asurak]], [[Avaaros Wolfwalker]], [[Davelor]], [[Heilar]], [[Reznak]], [[Ruby]], and [[Tia Thunderstep]], and, newly also [[Sealion]] Sherlock her familiar Character Sheet 1 frame: Runa Character Sheet Backstory
